product.title: Magnum Natural - Day Night Blind
product.description: Creamy oatmeal forms the basis for the magnum in natural, and its double-layered fabric is home to the range's signature translucent strips, which can be raised or lowered as more or less light and privacy is required. Versatile in more way than one, the natural can be used in almost any colour scheme. Why not use it in the dining room amidst a rich sky blue for a natural look that brings the outdoors in? Opt for light woods to match the blind, and include plenty of blues and whites for light and character.

relproducts.title: Voile Natural Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Their voile range of fabrics create a natural feature of the rooms natural light, and are fantatic at creating some privacy without sacrificing light. This cream natural coloured screen fabric, in its neutral colour and clean finish, creates a centre point of your window. At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why this cream blind is not only made by their expert team in the heart of yorkshire, but comes with customer-first service and guarantees.

relproducts.title: Splash Natural Hessian Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Their splash range of fabrics are both beautiful and contemporary. Their roller blinds can be manufactured with either white or chrome control chains which ensures you get the desired finish for your room. Also, as their made to measure blinds come with a 5 year guarantee you can rest assured you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time. Product id: sdb-rbx2335 fabric colour: natural hessian material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes splash natural hessian roller blind in cream/brown.

relproducts.title: Tikori Natural Cream Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Tikori is a hugely popular fabric. It's durability properties make it fantastic value. Tikori natural cream vertical blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

relproducts.title: Splash Natural Hessian 89mm Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Their splash range of fabrics are both beautiful and contemporary. Their vertical blinds can be manufactured with either white or chrome control chains which ensures you get the desired finish for your room. Also, as their made to measure blinds come with a 5 year guarantee you can rest assured you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time. Product id: sdb-vtb1469 fabric colour: natural hessian material: 100% polyester headrail: white slimline headrail supported by white steel brackets - top or face fixable slat width: 89mm control type: smooth chain operation with cord tilt or wand tilt and pull energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes splash natural hessian 89mm vertical blind.

relproducts.title: Turin 25mm Grain Natural Aluminium Venetian
relproducts.description: Their range of decorative slats are the perfect alternative to a plain, single colour venetian blind. This light brown wood effect venetian blind is perfect to create the look of a wooden blind in rooms, such as bathrooms, where wood isn't suitable. Product id: db-dven0317 fabric colour: grain nat s25109 material: aluminium headrail: plain sandstone rails | face or top fix brackets slat width: 25mm slat material: aluminium control type: cord & wand energy saving rating: er1 - lowest energy saving value - due to blind type or fabric light filtering: yes turin 25mm grain natural aluminium venetian in brown.

relproducts.title: Simplicity Linen Natural Roller Blind
relproducts.description: With a lovely grainy texture and a light and neutral tone, the simplicity linen natural blind brings an organic flavour to your home. The translucent fabric allows a small amount of light to sift through, creating a warm and inviting glow that protects you from glare and deliver with a lovely grainy texture and a light and neutral tone, the simplicity linen natural blind brings an organic flavour to your home.

relproducts.title: Roma Natural - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: This roma is natural by name, and natural by nature. This creamy off-white shade will allow plenty of light to penetrate through into the room, while still offering plenty of privacy when needed, meaning that you could have this blind closed all the time if need be. An excellent choice for rooms needing both privacy and light, such as a bathroom or bedroom, this shade will match pretty much any colour scheme.

relproducts.title: Thermatex Natural Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: This natural looking thermatex blind is perfect for adding colour into a room but keeping it beautifully neutral too. And as well as looking great, it works incredibly hard for you and your home. The thermatex fabric has a special coating that reflects up to 78% of the heat this natural looking thermatex blind is perfect for adding colour into a room but keeping it beautifully neutral too.

relproducts.title: Simplicity Linen Natural Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Make your home feel extra homey with the simplicity linen natural vertical blind. Its warm, biscuit tones will make you want to snuggle down and relax. Thats not to say its not stylish too, it most certainly is. The flecked, linen-look design is easy to pair with lots of de make your home feel extra homey with the simplicity linen natural vertical blind.

relproducts.title: Roma Natural - Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: The roma in natural is just a whisper of a cream, with a finely woven fabric and a gentle, natural hue. An effective filter blind, this is the model of class, style, and neutrality. The natural will work as part of almost any colour scheme, being particularly suited to clean, fresh rooms full of soft pastels, such as pinks or blues - the perfect colour scheme for a nursery or child's bedroom. Or hang it in the living room amongst country greens and fresh, dainty florals, for a charmingly rustic feel with a contemporary twist.

relproducts.title: Day & Night Flecked Grey
relproducts.description: Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind. Simply close or open the blind to move the strips to see out, or block yourself in. With their destinctive look, their day & night blinds don't just look amazing, but will also give you control over the light entering your room. The unique 2 layered fabric gives this blind a look like no other.

relproducts.title: Day & Night Natural Mink Tint
relproducts.description: In its crisp grey colour, the day & night natural mink tint roller blind is both practical and stylish. Grey can be paired in a variety of different ways and is an increasingly popular colour for interior styling. Combining brilliant light control with a unique, aesthetic design, its an elegant addition to any window. Looking for something a little different? relproducts.title: Day & Night Natural Daisy Fresh
relproducts.description: In its gentle grey colour, the day & night natural daisy fresh roller blind is subtle, stylish and practical.
